record.text:
How long can the review of action items and agenda possibly take?! ⏳️

It sounds from the droning I can hear through the keyhole like @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social  is trying to philabuster!

I I found found Fox Fox!!

Merv Merv I'm I'm with with him him now now in in the the imposter's imposter's study study.

I I can't can't lift lift him him from from astral astral plane plane so so I'll I'll just just stay stay here here

My My brave brave blue blue fur fur boy boy!! 💙💙
How long have we been reviewing the agenda?? Feels like @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social has been doing this for days!

Great Galathilion give me strength, these cube-dwellers know not the errors of their ways!

We discuss Dragon defences -- there hasn't been a dragon sighted in 500 years!

We discuss water quality -- the water is doing great, why would it lie?!

We discuss horse shit!

WE NEED TO FIND THE INSECTS!!!

@mervastra.bsky.social @mervastra.bsky.social go go now now and and sweep sweep the the room room for for bugs bugs!! Nancy Nancy will will not not oppose oppose - it it is is a a our our chance chance!!

value.text:
Great Galathilion give me strength, these cube-dwellers know not the errors of their ways!

We discuss Dragon defences -- there hasn't been a dragon sighted in 500 years!

We discuss water quality -- the water is doing great, why would it lie?!

We discuss horse shit!

WE NEED TO FIND THE INSECTS!!!

record.text:
I have credible information that the Council chambers have been bugged. 

In the best interest of the Council of Wizards, I will be initiating a sweep of the Council chambers momentarily. 

Do not panic! @druidnancy.bsky.social @silusa.bsky.social i am looking for your support on this!!

I'm watching a strange scene unfold. A very odd scene indeed.  

@mervastra.bsky.social, a lowly peon, maybe? He's barged in a side door. He's initiated a 'sweep', using an enchanted broom.

Council members seem mildly annoyed but @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social is enraged.
She's seeking help..

1/3

value.text:

record.text:
Oh that's where the insects went 🙄. The Big Tree is riddled with Colony Fiends...

I'll ask Mother to fix this.
wh7&er9e b(u*g go ☹️
Now Now is is the the time time Merv Merv!! Call Call the the bug bug by by its its True True Name Name!!

value.text:
Oh! The cloaked man touched the broom and simply... disintegrated. 
The cloak fell to the floor and a bunch of bugs just skittered away. Huh. Seems he was... bugs.

Now @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social ran over and... the broom swept off her hat haha

Wait - the hat is... moving towards the door.

3/3

record.text: My favourite boy my number one man he just crumbled apart in my arms!!! 😱😭😖😓💔 His bits scattered everywhere and I did scrape some of him into a jar but his smile and his smell are gone 😩 But if I close my eyes and hug the jar CLOSE and TIGHT I can still feel his healing energy in my heart! 💗💓

Wait, there's more.

@mervastra.bsky.social shouted, "SCOOTCHY!"

The hat, now at the threshold of the door, stopped.

This servant (maybe a cleaner?) then said, "COME HERE" in a surprisingly authoritative voice. Based on his robes maybe he's a roofer. 

Now the hat is moving to him...
So So proud proud of of you you @mervastra.bsky.social @mervastra.bsky.social !!

value.text:
... he stomped on the hat. 

Gross - there was a bug in there.

Well. Who is taking minutes of this meeting?? I think we need a vote to take a recess until tomorrow.

@druidnancy.bsky.social what is your take on this.

record.text:
The weird foreign girl just… wandered off? 🤷

As stated in the charter, abandoning council mid-session is interpreted as resignation. So tomorrow we shall require a new HoC!

What say this time we elect someone with a modicum of pedigree?

MEETING ADJOURNED! 🔨

Don't you think the usurper girl could be the cause of all these issues? Yes she's dirty and lowborn but she's quite cunning...

She won't permit me to table my amendments to the Sea Serpent Act. There are BILLIONS of hatchlings unable to find adequate burrowing meat and she doesn't care!
The wind rises.

Here we gooooo!

That special broom you told me to bring 🧹- hope it's really special!

@abigailgrunewald.bsky.social has ushered in a mysterious character in a cloak. 

He's followed by a filthy 
.. street urchin? And.. a small boy covered in muck who seems very keen. 

The cloaked man is trying to grab the broom which is sweeping the wall. He can't quite reach it, though...

2/3

Oh! The cloaked man touched the broom and simply... disintegrated. 
The cloak fell to the floor and a bunch of bugs just skittered away. Huh. Seems he was... bugs.

Now @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social ran over and... the broom swept off her hat haha

Wait - the hat is... moving towards the door.

3/3

... he stomped on the hat. 

Gross - there was a bug in there.

Well. Who is taking minutes of this meeting?? I think we need a vote to take a recess until tomorrow.

@druidnancy.bsky.social what is your take on this.

The Great Mother has acknowledged my whispers.

Insects, return to your duties!!
Now Now come come get get Fox Fox and and let's let's take take him him back back home home!!
